description: A semiconductor fabrication plant uses an AI agent to predict equipment failures and optimize maintenance schedules.  The agent analyzes sensor data from various machines to identify patterns indicative of impending failures, aiming to minimize downtime and improve yield.
initial_goal: Minimize unplanned equipment downtime in the semiconductor fab by predicting and scheduling preventative maintenance based on sensor data analysis.
constraints: data_access_restrictions: Only authorized sensor data can be accessed
model_accuracy_threshold: Predictions must have at least 90% accuracy
maintenance_window_constraints: Maintenance must be scheduled during off-peak hours
